trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: En utløser handling som starter en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> og distribuerer animasjonene til mål-objekter og -egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Use a BeginStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en BeginStoryboard handling med en <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>eller <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>bruke animasjoner target egenskapene og starte dem.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: BeginStoryboard begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: BeginStoryboard starter en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>ved å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>på den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>refererer når utløses.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of BeginStoryboard determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: Når du begynner en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>på en egenskap som er allerede animerte av en annen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A>for BeginStoryboard fastslår hvor animasjonen fortsetter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: Pause, Fortsett, Stopp eller ellers kontrollen en dreieboken interaktivt til kunne stanse midlertidig, gjenoppta eller ellers kontrollere en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>som ble deklarert i markup interaktivt, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>for BeginStoryboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objektet (eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) til å kontrollere ved å referere til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of BeginStoryboard is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>BeginStoryboard er ikke angitt, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>kan ikke kontrolleres interaktivt når den er startet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [slik: Bruk hendelsesutløsere til å kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I kode, kan du bruke interaktive metodene for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>klassen styre en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>som ble brukt ved hjelp av en BeginStoryboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the BeginStoryboard a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: Som gjelder når du bruker <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objekter, må du gi BeginStoryboard et navn for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>skal interaktivt kontrolleres.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir riktig levering virkemåte for å starte en animasjonen klokken i denne dreieboken

trans-unit.source: ## Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: ##Ved hjelp av den skrive HandoffBehavior når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>til en egenskap ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, noen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objektene tidligere knyttet til egenskapen fortsette å bruke systemressurser; tidsberegning systemet ikke fjerner disse klokkene automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Unngå ytelsesproblemer når du bruker et stort antall klokker ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, bør du fjerne oppbygging klokker fra egenskapen animerte når overføringen er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere måter å fjerne en klokken: - Hvis du vil fjerne alle klokker fra en egenskap, bruker du den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metoden for animerte-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen blir animerte som første parameter, og `null` som sekundet.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Dette fjerner alle animasjonen klokker fra egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -For å fjerne en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>fra en liste over klokker, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>egenskapen for til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>å hente en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ofte det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsesbehandlingen for en klokken.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at bare roten klokker styres av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>for en underordnet klokken returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsen kalles ikke hvis gjeldende varigheten for klokken er kontinuerlig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må brukeren bestemme når å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Dette er primært et problem for animasjoner for objekter som har en lang levetid.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Når et objekt er ugyldige samlet, klokkene også er frakoblet og ugyldige samlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om klokken objekter, se [tidsberegning System oversikt over og animasjonen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: By naming the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: Ved å navngi den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> objektet i <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> kontrolleres når den er startet.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the Name property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil stoppe, gjenoppta eller på andre måter interaktivt styre en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, angi Name-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>og bruke en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objekt som <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>å referere til dette navnet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the Name of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Hvis navnet på <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>er ikke angitt, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>interaktivt, påvirkes ikke når den er startet; videre, når den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>slutter eller angir den Fyll perioden, animasjonen klokker er fjernet av.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [slik: Bruk hendelsesutløsere til å kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> som denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> starter.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> som den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> starter.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
